thread.title: James Marsden Takes 15-Year-Old Son Jack to SAG Awards 2017!
thread.title_full: James Marsden Takes 15-Year-Old Son Jack to SAG Awards 2017!

author: Just Jared
title: James Marsden Takes 15-Year-Old Son Jack to SAG Awards 2017!
text:
James Marsden looks so handsome while walking the red carpet at the 2017 Screen Actors Guild Awards on Sunday (January 29) in Los Angeles.
The 43-year-old actor as joined at the show by his 15-year-old son Jack !
“We’re excited. I’m just trying to keep up with him, the dress, the attire, he wears things I can’t,” James , who is nominated for his work on Westworld , told People on the red carpet.
Jack is rocking platinum blonde hair and said on the carpet that he would like to get into music!
FYI: James is wearing a Valentino tux, Christian Louboutin shoes, an IWC watch, and Montblanc cufflinks.
